column2: i understand if you are busy but at least pretend like you are
column4: she was extremely rude and the WORST service I've ever had in my life! The pizza was not that great
column5: tasted like it had been under a heat lamp for a while. And the food in general was over shadowed by her horrible service. On a side note I saw the manager walking around (guy in his early 40s maybe) but couldn't find him after the service took a turn for the horrible. Or I would've said something to him.
